content: We test our apps to ensure they work for a variety of mobile devices and operating systems. Our features include:
Accessible Rich Internet Application (ARIA)] codes on every mobile web page to help users find information.
Web pages that support mobile screen readers.
Alternative text for applicable images and other non-text elements.
Semantic markup, using headings and lists, to show page structure.
Form fields with labels, so screen reader users can understand which fields they are filling out.
Error messages to help users correct information.
ARIA attributes to help assistive aids communicate information about controls and links.
Data cells in data tables with their headers.
Page titles that clearly describe the purpose of each page.
JavaScript and style sheets to enhance the look and functionality of our mobile apps and pages.
Logical swiping order for all links, buttons and other controls.
We welcome your feedback and suggestions. If you have any problems with our mobile applications or websites, please call us:
